game.name: DCS: Marianas WWII
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, Captions available, VR Support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Touch Only Option, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: The Marianas 1944 terrain freezes the archipelago at a knife-edge moment days before the first U.S. Marine amphibious waves slam ashore in Operation Forager.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Marianas 1944 terrain freezes the archipelago at a knife-edge moment days before the first U.S. Marine amphibious waves slam ashore in Operation Forager.
